H0.text: Which mythological creatures are half horse and half man. Centaur

H1.text: Which mythological creatures are half horse and half man. Kinnara

H2.text: Which mythological creatures are half horse and half man. Satyr

H3.text: Which mythological creatures are half horse and half man. Sintar

A4.text: A creature from Greek mythology with the upper body of a human and the lower body and legs of a horse

A5.text: Kinnaras, another half-man, half-horse mythical creature from Indian mythology, appeared in various ancient texts, arts, and sculptures from all around India.

A6.text: The Warburg Institute Iconographic Database contains images of centaurs.

A7.text: Harry Potter Lexicon contains an article on centaurs in the Harry Potter universe.
